doc.title: Ballroom Dancing for Beginners
doc.plot: Join in the fun! Learn to master the basic techniques of ballroom dancing. Your competence and confidence will grow as you progress through lessons that cover the basic elements of dance and music, dance positions, and the patterns for popular dance styles like the Fox Trot, Cha-cha and Tango. Instructor Teresa Mason has over fifteen years of professional teaching experience and has competed in numerous U.S. and international competitions.
